participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Driven and ambitious, always looking for new challenges.
participant_1.background: My best friend is gay. My passion is in programming. One day I hope to own my own company. I am in school to be a computer engineer. I go to bed pretty late.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and family-oriented, loves sports and being active.
participant_2.background: I went to Miami University. I am a baseball player. I'm married and have three kids. I make a million dollars a year.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a baseball player.
That's cool! I'm a computer engineer in training.
What do you like about programming?
I love the challenge of it. It's always changing and there's always something new to learn.
That's true. What are you most passionate about?
I'm passionate about starting my own company. I think it would be really cool to be my own boss and make my own rules.
That's awesome! I wish you the best of luck.
Thanks! What do you do in your free time?
I like to spend time with my family. I have three kids and we love to go to the park, play games, and watch movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm single, but I have a great group of friends. We like to go out to eat, go to the movies, and play games.
That sounds like a lot of fun too.
It is. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play baseball, go to the gym, and watch movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm not much of a sports person, but I do like to go to the gym. I also like to read and watch movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun too.
It is. So, what are you looking for in a friend?
I'm looking for someone who is kind, funny, and intelligent.
That sounds great. I'm all of those things!
(laughing) I'm sure you are.
I am.
So, what do you think? Do you want to be friends?
Sure! I'd love to be friends.
